author: adapdoaosdaoda
name: MonkeyModal
description: A robust utility cog for creating 'Modern Modals' with Discord API v10 components. This cog acts as a shared service allowing other cogs to create and await modals containing Select Menus (String, User, Role, Mentionable, Channel) and Text Inputs. It bypasses discord.py validation by making raw API v10 calls with proper component schemas (including required 'label' fields for select menus), providing a clean, Pythonic interface for building complex modals and awaiting user submissions.
install_msg:
✅ **MonkeyModal Installed**

This cog provides a shared service for creating modern modals with all Discord API v10 component types.

**Features:**
• ModalBuilder with fluent API for constructing modals
• Support for Text Input (Type 4)
• Support for String Select (Type 3)
• Support for User Select (Type 5)
• Support for Role Select (Type 6)
• Support for Mentionable Select (Type 7)
• Support for Channel Select with type filters (Type 8)
• Raw API bypass to avoid discord.py validation
• Future-based awaiting of modal submissions
• Clean, Pythonic interface for other cogs

**Usage Example:**
```python
monkey_cog = bot.get_cog("MonkeyModal")
builder = monkey_cog.create_builder("my_modal", "My Modal Title")
builder.add_text_input("name", "Your Name")
builder.add_role_select("role", label="Select Role", placeholder="Pick a role")
result = await monkey_cog.prompt(interaction, builder, timeout=300)
```

**Commands:**
• `[p]monkeymodaltest` - Test the MonkeyModal system with a comprehensive modal

**For Developers:**
This cog is designed to be used as a dependency by other cogs that need to create advanced modals with select components. See the cog docstrings for detailed API documentation.
short: Utility cog for creating modern modals with Discord API v10 select components
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data. It only provides utilities for other cogs to create and manage modals.
